name: Loopball
description:
Game made for Ludum dare 47

Press right to turn clockwise(to be more precise, apply a clockwise impulse), left vice versa
just loop as many loops in time limitation as you can, each flag gives 5 sec.
Sorry I have no time to polish for I just abandoned the first idea on which I worked tens of hours.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loopball
